tool_description: The ultimate API for a full list of all AI tools available in the world in all categories, updated continuously.
name: AI Catalogue
title: AI Catalogue

api_list.name: Search
Get Tool By ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-catalogue.p.rapidapi.com/tools/3d-model/imagine-3d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-catalogue.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://ai-catalogue.p.rapidapi.com/tools/{categoryid}/{toolid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-catalogue.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
